name: UpdateMsTeamsTenantHandle
description:
Update a Microsoft Teams tenant-based handle in Datadog.

Use this tool to update a tenant-based handle for the Datadog Microsoft Teams integration. This is useful when you need to modify existing handle configurations for tenant-based integrations.

parameters.name: tenant_handle_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the tenant-based handle to update in Datadog.

parameters.name: tenant_handle_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the resource type for the tenant-based handle, usually 'tenant-based-handle'.

value_schema.description: Specifies the tenant-based handle resource type.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Microsoft Teams channel to update for the tenant-based handle.

parameters.name: tenant_handle_name
parameters.description: Tenant-based handle name for the Microsoft Teams integration in Datadog. This specifies the handle's identifier within the configuration.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The Microsoft Teams Team ID for the tenant-based handle. Required for updating handle configurations.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the tenant. Used to specify which tenant's handle is being updated.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: Specifies the tenant-based handle resource type.

value_schema.description: Specifies the tenant-based handle resource type.
